00037 #ifndef EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_

00068 
00097 class EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_IsotropicSource :
00098           public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00099 
00100 public:
00101 
00103     enum GeometryConfinement {
00104         IncludeAll      = 0,
00105         ExcludeAll      = 1,
00106         IncludeSelected = 2,
00107         ExcludeSelected = 3
00108     };
00109 
00115     EGS_IsotropicSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, EGS_BaseShape *Shape,
00116             EGS_BaseGeometry *geometry,
00117             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00118             EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), shape(Shape),
00119             min_theta(85.), max_theta(95.), min_phi(0), max_phi(2*M_PI),
00120             buf_1(1), buf_2(-1),
00121             geom(geometry), regions(0), nrs(0), gc(IncludeAll) { setUp(); };
00122 
00127     EGS_IsotropicSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00128     ~EGS_IsotropicSource() {
00129         egsWarning("destructing point source\n");
00130         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00131         if( geom ) {
00132             if( !geom->deref() ) delete geom;
00133         }
00134         if( nrs > 0 && regions ) delete [] regions;
00135     };
00136 
00137     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00138             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00139         bool ok = true;
00140         do {
00141             x = shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00142             if( geom ) {
00143                 if( gc == IncludeAll ) ok = geom->isInside(x);
00144                 else if( gc == ExcludeAll ) ok = !geom->isInside(x);
00145                 else if( gc == IncludeSelected ) {
00146                     ok = false; int ireg = geom->isWhere(x);
00147                     for(int j=0; j<nrs; ++j) {
00148                         if( ireg == regions[j] ) { ok = true; break; }
00149                     }
00150                 }
00151                 else {
00152                     ok = true; int ireg = geom->isWhere(x);
00153                     for(int j=0; j<nrs; ++j) {
00154                         if( ireg == regions[j] ) { ok = false; break; }
00155                     }
00156                 }
00157             }
00158         } while ( !ok );
00159 
00160         u.z = rndm->getUniform()*(buf_1 - buf_2) - buf_1;
00161 
00162         //u.z = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00163         EGS_Float sinz = 1-u.z*u.z;
00164         if( sinz > 1e-15 ) {
00165             sinz = sqrt(sinz); EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00166             //rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00167             // sample phi, slower than rndm->getAzimuth
00168             EGS_Float phi = min_phi +(max_phi - min_phi)*rndm->getUniform();
00169             cphi = cos(phi); sphi = sin(phi);
00170             u.x = sinz*cphi; u.y = sinz*sphi;
00171         } else { u.x = 0; u.y = 0; }
00172         wt = 1;
00173     };
00174 
00175     EGS_Float getFluence() const { return count; };
00176 
00177     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const { return true; };
00178 
00179     bool setFluenceState(istream &) { return true; };
00180 
00181     bool isValid() const { return (s != 0 && shape != 0); };
00182 
00183 protected:
00184 
00185     EGS_BaseShape *shape;  
00186     EGS_BaseGeometry *geom;
00187     int              *regions;
00188 
00189     void setUp();
00190 
00191     EGS_Float min_theta, max_theta;
00192     EGS_Float buf_1, buf_2;     
00193     EGS_Float min_phi, max_phi;
00194     int                 nrs;
00195     GeometryConfinement gc;
00196 };
00197 
00198 // change log:
00199 // Long, Jan 15 2008 add polar angle limitation and macro support
00200 //                  a word on the polar angle sampling:
00201 //                        cos(theta) follows a uniform distribution
00202 
00203 #endif
